briefTitle: Long-Term Safety and Efficacy of rFIXFc in the Prevention and Treatment of Bleeding Episodes in Previously Treated Participants With Hemophilia B
officialTitle: An Open-Label, Multicenter, Evaluation of the Long-Term Safety and Efficacy of Recombinant Human Coagulation Factor IX Fusion Protein (rFIXFc) in the Prevention and Treatment of Bleeding Episodes in Previously Treated Subjects With Hemophilia B

interventions.name: rFIXFc
otherNames: coagulation factor IX (recombinant) Fc fusion protein

summary:
The primary objective of the study is to evaluate the long-term safety of rFIXFc in participants with hemophilia B.

The secondary objective of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of rFIXFc in the prevention and treatment of bleeding episodes.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Any Positive Inhibitor Development
